impact-statement: Sensory neurons in the olfactory system develop from two different regions of the ectoderm, the olfactory placode and the cranial neural crest, whereas sensory neurons within the eye and ear develop from just one region.

competing-interest.conf2: The other authors declare that no competing interests exist.
